Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to establishing the New York state innovation voucher program
Summary: Establishes the New York state innovation voucher program; provides small businesses with access to research and development by colleges and universities, government laboratories and public research institutes in order to assist such businesses in the creation of innovative products or services.
LawSection: New York State Urban Development Corporation Act
LawCode: Add ยง16-bb, amd ยง16-m, UDC Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the urban development corporation act, in relation to establishing the New York state innovation voucher program
